Although December is the busiest time

like

goods inside are clothes.
The brand's used clothes are sold
for about 10 days. This store is
located next to the regular unic store in the
trendy shopping district of Harajuku.
Customers say they want their clothes to last
longer because of development.
That perception has been increasingly popular in Japan in the
past. Japanese people were very afraid of used clothes
because of hygiene issues, but it seems that
consumers have overcome
that psychological obstacle because the used clothes business is
booming in Japan.  Japan with a growth rate of
this market is 40 million per year reaching sales of
more than 4 billion USD
